title: Calories in a 12 oz Coke
meta_description: Discover calories in a 12 oz coke, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, sugars, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Regular Coca-Cola, classic formula, carbonated soft drink in a standard 12 oz can; no ice or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, formula, regional differences, and serving temperature; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 12 oz Coke contains 140 calories, primarily from 39 g of sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a 12 oz Coke?
What's the sugar content in a 12 oz Coke?
faqs.a: Approximately 39 g of sugars, equivalent to 10 teaspoons.

faqs.q: Does a 12 oz Coke have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's purely carbs from sugar.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a 12 oz Coke?
faqs.a: Around 45 mg of sodium per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: Are there calories in Diet Coke?
faqs.a: No, Diet Coke has 0 calories due to artificial sweeteners.
